content:
An applicant may file an update to a subdivision construction plan application until
the underlying application has expired under Section 25-1-84 (Subdivision Construction Plan Application Requirements and Expiration).

Source: Ord. No. 20160421-039, Pt. 10, 5-2-16; Ord. No. 20190822-117, Pt. 35, 9-1-19; Ord. No. 20230831-141, Pts. 31, 33, 9-11-23.
